Uses of Class
Collectable

    • Uses of Collectable in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of Collectable in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Energy
      Energy is collected by the character, having enough will allow the character to open powered doors.
      class  HazmatSuit
      Hazmat Suits will prevent the character from getting killed when they move onto acid tiles.
      class  KeyCard
      KeyCards are collected by the character, they will match with a coloured door based on colour and will let the character open them if collected..
      class  RubberBoots
      Rubber Boots will prevent the character from getting killed when they move onto tiles of wires.
      class  Treasure
      Treasure is collected by the character, this allowes the character to get a higher score.
      Fields in <Unnamed> declared as Collectable 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Collectable Floor.collSlot 
      private Collectable[] Character.inventory 
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Collectable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static Collectable ReadLevelInfo.createColl(java.lang.String collInfo)
      Creates a Collectable instance based of a small String passed to the method.
      Collectable Floor.getCollectable()
      Gets the Collectable referneced by the Floor cell.
      Collectable[] Character.getInventory()
      Gets the inventory of the character.
      private Collectable[] PoweredDoor.removeEnergy(Collectable[] c)
      Remove the required amount of Energy instances from a passed array of Collectable instances.
      private Collectable[] ColouredDoor.removeKeyCard(Collectable[] c, KeyCard k)
      Removes a specific instance of KeyCard from a passed array of Collectable instances.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Collectable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Character.addCollectable(Collectable c)
      Adds a new Collectable instance to the character's inventory.
      private boolean Hazard.checkCol(Collectable[] col)
      Checks if an instance of a particular type of Collectable is present in a list of Collectable instances.
      protected boolean Wires.checkCollectable(Collectable c)
      Checks if the instance of Collectable passed to the method is an instance of the subclass RubberBoots.
      protected abstract boolean Hazard.checkCollectable(Collectable c)
      Checks if the passed Collectable is an instance of the required subclass.
      protected boolean Acid.checkCollectable(Collectable c)
      Checks if the instance of Collectable passed to the method is an instance of the subclass HazmatSuit.
      private static java.lang.String ReadLevelInfo.getCollectableString(Collectable c)
      Creates a String based on the passed Collectable instance.
      private Collectable[] PoweredDoor.removeEnergy(Collectable[] c)
      Remove the required amount of Energy instances from a passed array of Collectable instances.
      private Collectable[] ColouredDoor.removeKeyCard(Collectable[] c, KeyCard k)
      Removes a specific instance of KeyCard from a passed array of Collectable instances.
      void Floor.setCollectable(Collectable coll)
      Sets the collSlot reference to the passed instance of Collectable.
      void Character.setInventory(Collectable[] cs)
      Sets the inventory to be equal to a new array of Collectable instances.
      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Collectable 
      Constructor and Description
      Floor(Collectable coll)
      The constructor will take a Collectable instance to be referenced in collSlot.
